snippet.title: Undeadly - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
THE DEAD RISE - Direct a group of survivors in a turn-based strategy survival game. Use survivor abilities, scavenge for resources and let loose with the arsenal at your disposal. Come nightfall, undead seek the living. Can you survive, UNDEADLY?

Undeadly is the debut release of Irreflex Studios and is the work of its sole developer, Ryan Le Quesne. The game is a passionate mash-up of favourite genres and tropes, particularly from strategy and survival games.

An Early Access campaign will soon be underway that aims to see the vision of Undeadly realised. Stay tuned for more news about the details and how your feedback can play a role.

Visit https://linktr.ee/irreflex for more links and https://irreflex.github.io/undeadly/ to sign up to the mailing list.
